a_new_day_starts_at_description: Show the tasks of the previous day on the Today screen and in the widget until the specified hour after midnight. It will be useful for those who stay up late.
about_lists_description1: Task lists allow you to group tasks and get quick access to them via the drop-down menu on the "Today" screen.
about_lists_description2: Drag the lists to change their order in the drop-down menu (except for Today, Tomorrow, and Yesterday). To hide the list from the drop-down menu, move it to the archive by clicking on the box icon.
access_to_future_premium_functions: Access to future premium functions (application is being actively developed!)
account-exists-with-different-credential: An account already exists with the same email address ({}) but different sign-in credentials. Sign in using a provider associated with this email address.
account_for_synchronization_description: Sign in to the Google account with which you want to sync tasks.
achievement_brainstorm_description: Bring your average monthly activity to {} or more.
achievement_completion_series_descriptio: Complete a regular task {} in a row with no skips.
achievement_finish_repeated_tasks_descri: Achieve finish condition of regular tasks {}.
achievement_full_day_description: Complete at least one morning, one noon and one evening task in one day.
achievement_future_task_description: Complete any task in the future.
achievement_helping_notification_descrip: Enter the app or complete the task via notification.
achievement_intro_description: Finish a quick tutorial on how to use the application.
achievement_perfect_days_description: Bring the number of perfect days to {} or more.
achievement_rainbow_colors_description: Create at least one task for each of the basic colors.
achievement_with_schedule_yearly_descrip: Create a regular task with a schedule like "On certain dates".
active_lists_limit_description: The free version allows you to have only 3 active lists at a time.
add_tasks_and_they_will_appear: Add tasks and they will appear in this list
additional_rights_may_be_required: Additional rights may be required for correct display of notifications. For more details, see "Settings" -> "Notification settings" menu.
all_tasks_completed: All tasks for today have been completed
allow_fingerprint_unlock_details: To enable this option, set up fingerprint unlock in your phone settings.
automatic_sync_description: Synchronizes tasks when entering and exiting (minimizing) an application.
automatically_mark_tasks: Automatically mark tasks that are not completed on time as skipped
average_monthly_activity_description: Activity reflects the number of task completions in one day. Average monthly activity is the average number of completions over the last 30 days.
background_sync_description: Sync tasks between devices every 15 minutes in the background (even when the app is closed). May increase battery drain slightly.
beta_premium_is_free: During beta testing, the premium version is free.
cache_cleared: The application cache has been successfully cleared and updated.
calendar_cleared_description: The calendar with all imported tasks has been removed from Google Calendar.
clear_calendar_description: Clear Google Calendar from all tasks imported from Tusk.
clear_notifications_when_entering: Clear the current list of notifications when entering the application
clear_sync_data_description: Removes all data on the server and allows you to sync tasks from scratch.
click_on_the_icon_to_change_it: Click on the icon to change it
comment_on_the_task: Comment on the task. For example, completion details or reason for skipping.
complete_and_hide_with_one_swipe: Complete and hide task with one swipe
complete_when_timer_ends: Automatically complete the task when the timer ends
completions_at_the_end_of_previous_month: Completions at the end of the previous month do not affect the schedule of the next one.
completions_at_the_end_of_previous_week: Completions at the end of the previous week do not affect the schedule of the next one.
completions_at_the_end_of_previous_year: Completions at the end of the previous year do not affect the schedule of the next one.
confirm_calendar_clear_description: Are you sure you want to clear Google Calendar of tasks and calendars imported from Tusk?
confirm_delete_all_tasks: Delete all tasks, achievements, tags and other data, and start from scratch?
copy_task_description: Create a copy of the current task and open it for editing? The start date will be set to today. The execution history will not be copied.
delete_imported_tasks_description: Delete all tasks imported from Google Calendar? Tasks (events) will remain in Google Calendar and you can always import them again.
delete_task_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the task with all its completion history? It will be impossible to undo this action.
display_compact_tasks: Compact display of tasks on the "Tasks" page
do_you_want_to_delete_holiday: Do you want to delete holiday?
enable_autostart_xiaomi: For correct display of notifications on Xiaomi phones, please enable the Autostart option in the application settings. Click on the "Settings" button to open the application settings.
enable_lock_screen_details: Access to the application will be protected by a PIN-code.
enable_notifications_option: Please enable the display of notifications in the application settings. Click on the "Settings" button to open the application settings.
every_last_day_of_the_month: Every last day of the month
every_penultimate_day_of_the_month: Every penultimate day of the month
execution_log_description: Adds the option to leave comments on completed and skipped days. A journal with all comments appears on the task page.
execution_time_for_each_repetition: You can specify the execution time for each repetition in the "Time" section.
export_on_midnight: Export tasks without set time as events with time "00:00" instead of "All day".
failed_to_clear_calendar: Failed to clear the calendar. Please re-login the app or try again later.
filling_period_description: For how many days to fill Google Calendar with tasks:
finish_task_description: Mark the task as finished: it will no longer appear in the calendar and on the Tasks screen without a filter. To cancel this status, edit the task in the "Task finish" section.
finish_when_the_date_is_reached: The task will be finished when the date is reached:
finish_when_the_number_is_reached: The task will be finished after the specified number of repetitions is completed:
floating_due_date_n_description: Execute on any day of the {}-day period.
for_all_executions_of_task: For all executions of the task
for_period_according_to_schedule: For periods according to the schedule
free_execution_log_limitations: The free version allows to enable an execution log for only one active task.
free_notifications_limitations: The free version allows to set notifications for only 5 active tasks.
google_fit_benefit: Google Fit stats tracking (steps count, activity time, calories burned)
google_fit_data_tracking_description: Automatically complete the task when Google Fit stats is equal or greater than value:
hide_completed_subtasks: Hide completed subtasks from the task card.
holidays_description: You can take a break from completing certain tasks or all at once. Paused tasks are not displayed in the calendar, skips and completions during this period do not affect statistics.
how_to_add_tasks_via_google_calendar: How to add tasks via Google Calendar?
how_to_add_tasks_via_google_calendar_des: One-time tasks can be added via Google Calendar. To do this, create a new Google Task or Google Event (depending on which type of synchronized tasks you have chosen) through the Google Calendar interface, specifying "Tusk" as the calendar. On the next sync, Tusk will import these tasks to itself.
if_the_task_list_disappeared: If the list of tasks has disappeared, please try to rebuild the application cache and re-enter the application.
if_you_forget_your_pin: If you forget your PIN, please reinstall the application and use the "Restore from archive" function to restore your tasks.
ignore_certain_days_of_week: Ignore certain days of the week.
import_period_description: Events for what period to import from Google Calendar.
imported_tasks_deleted: The imported tasks have been deleted.
in_beta: The function is in beta mode. Incorrect counting is possible.
introduction_hint1:
This list displays your tasks for today.
Swipe the first task to the right to mark it as completed.
introduction_hint10:
We've also prepared a catalog of tasks for easier start.
So, shall we begin?
introduction_hint2: Perfect! To mark task as skipped, swipe it to the left. Try it.
introduction_hint3: The task skipped - it happens sometimes. Let's hide it from today tasks' list so we don't think about it anymore. To do this, swipe the task to the left again.
introduction_hint4: To see which tasks have been hidden, click on the crossed-eye icon.
introduction_hint5: As you can see, today one task has already been completed and hidden. Click on it to open the task details page.
introduction_hint6:
On this page you can see task details and a calendar.

The calendar shows all the past and future days of task execution.
introduction_hint7:
Just like on the previous screen, here you can swipe task card to the right to complete it and to the left to skip.
All right, ready to create your first task?
introduction_hint8: All right, ready to create your first task? Click on the plus icon.
introduction_hint9: There are two types of tasks: one-time and regular. For a regular task, you can set a flexible schedule for its repetition. One-time tasks are performed only once.
iterate_step_description: when the timer expires reset it and add 1 completion
its_never_too_late_to_learn: It's never too late to learn
lock_when_switching: Lock when switching to another app
login_with_email_and_password: Sign in with e-mail and password
longest_streak_description: The longest series of completions without skipping.
make_a_plan_for_the_month: Make a plan for the month
make_a_plan_for_the_week: Make a plan for the week
make_an_appointment_to_see_a_doctor: Make an appointment to see a doctor
mandatory_execution_description: After skipping, the task begins to appear every day until it is completed.
manual_task_sorting_description: You can drag and drop tasks, changing the default sort order (by time). New (unsorted) tasks appear at the top of the list.
manual_task_sorting_is_disabled: The option "Manual sorting of tasks" is disabled in advanced settings, so tasks are sorted only among tasks with the same execution time.
manual_task_sorting_is_within_groups: Manual drag and drop of tasks is possible only within the groups formed by the properties.
mark_as_finished: Mark the task as finished, with no conditions.
message_has_not_been_sent_description: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
message_has_sent_description: Thank you for the feedback! Your message has been sent to the developers.
move_unscheduled_execution: Move unscheduled execution to today until it is completed.
new_quote_will_appear_tomorrow: A new quote will appear tomorrow.
new_version_is_available: A new version of Tusk is available ({}). Update the app to the latest version?
no_achievements_yet: No achievements have been received yet.
no_connection_to_pay_service: There is no connection to the {} service. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
no_schedule_description: Regular tasks without a schedule are useful for keeping track of the execution of optional tasks on random arbitrary dates. For quick access, add such a task to custom task lists available through the "Today" heading on the main screen.
no_tasks_found: Tasks containing "{}" in name weren't found. Try to change filter parameters.
not_earlier_than_x_days_after: Not earlier than {} after the previous execution
notification_asus: • Android phone Settings > Power management > Auto-start manager > DOWNLOADED page > select 'Allow' for Tusk.
notification_htc: • Boost+ app > Optimize background apps > Tusk > select 'Off.'
notification_huawei:
• Android phone Settings > Apps > Apps > Tusk > Power Usage Details > App Launch > Set to Manage Manually and enable these options: Auto-Launch, Secondary Launch, and Run in Background.
  • Phone Manager app > Battery manager (or Energy Saver) > Protected apps > Enable Tusk.
  • Android phone Settings  > Advanced Settings > Battery manager (or Energy Saver) > Protected apps > Enable Tusk.
  • Android phone Settings  > 'All' tab > Protected apps > Enable Tusk.
  • Phone Manager App > Protected apps > Enable Tusk.
  • Android phone Settings  > Apps > Advanced/Special Access > Ignore battery optimizations > All Apps (drop down) > Enable Tusk.
  • Android phone settings > Battery > Launch > Tusk.
  • Android phone settings > Apps > Tusk > Data usage > Background Data > Enable.
  • Android phone Settings  > Notification panel & status bar > Notification center, find Tusk and activate Allow Notifications and Priority Display.
notification_lenovo: • Android phone Settings  > Power manager > Background app management > add Tusk to the unrestricted list or allow Tusk to auto-start.
notification_nokia: • Android phone settings > Battery > Background activity manager > ensure that the switch is disabled for Tusk.
notification_oneplus:
• Android phone Settings  > Apps > Gear icon > Apps Auto-launch > Enable Tusk start-up in the background.
  • Android phone Settings > Battery > Menu > Aggressive Doze & App Hibernation > Disable this mode or prevent Tusk from being limited in this mode.
  • Android phone Settings > Apps > Menu > Auto Run > Disable this mode or prevent Tusk from being limited in this mode.
notification_oppo:
• Apps > Security center > Privacy permissions > Auto-run management (or Startup manager) > Enable Tusk.
  • Android phone Settings  > Application management > Running tab > Enable Tusk.
notification_other: • Turn on the "Autostart" option for Tusk in your phone settings.
notification_samsung:
• Android phone Settings > Apps > Tusk > Mobile data > Allow background data usage
  • Android phone Settings  > Security > Auto-start management > Enable Tusk.
  • Android phone Settings > Device Maintenance > Battery > MENU > App Power Monitor > Disable or selectively choose apps to sleep from Settings > Device Maintenance > Battery. Make sure to exclude Tusk from the sleep list.
  • Android phone Settings > Device Maintenance > Battery > Power saving mode > Disable ot adjust to MID.
  • Android phone Settings  > Battery > Detail > Tusk > Turn off.
  • Apps drawer > Smart manager > Battery > Detail > Tusk > Turn off.
  • Android phone Settings  > Battery > Battery usage > MENU > Optimize battery usage > select 'All apps' > Disable Tusk.
  • Android phone Settings > Battery > Unmonitored apps > Add apps > Tusk > Done > Restart your phone.
notification_sony:
• Android phone Settings  > Storage & memory > turn off the 'Smart cleaner' option or continue to tap the three dots at the top right > Advanced > add Tusk to the whitelist.
  • Android phone Settings > Power management > Tap STAMINA mode > Apps active in standby > add Tusk to the whitelist.
notification_vivo: • Apps drawer > iManager > App manager > Autostart manager > allow Tusk to auto-start in the background.
notification_xiaomi:
• Apps drawer > Security app > Permissions > tap Autostart > Enable Tusk.
  • Android phone Settings > Services > Security > Permissions > Autostart > Enable  Tusk.
  • Android phone Settings  > Additional Settings > Battery and Performance > Manage apps' battery usage > turn 'Power saving modes' off > open the Security app > navigate to Permissions > add Tusk to Autostart > invoke Task Manager > find Tusk > drag it downwards until the padlock icon appears.
  • Android phone Security app > Settings > Data usage > Allow background data.
number_of_attempts_details: When the limit of login attempts is reached, the application will be blocked for 15 minutes.
number_of_completions_description:
The total number of completions of all tasks. One-time tasks are completed once, regular tasks are completed many times.
Task skipping is not counted as completion.
number_of_perfect_days_description: The number of days on which all tasks were completed. Days without tasks at all are not considered ideal.
offer_to_fill_in_log: Offer to fill in the execution log when you skip or complete a task.
on_a_specified_repetition_of_a_weekday: On a specified repetition of a weekday in the month
pending_tasks_first: Move completed and skipped tasks down the list
percentage_of_completions_description: Percentage of days with task completion out of all days with this task (including when the task was skipped).
periodic_synchronization_description: How often to periodically sync tasks with Google Calendar:
pin_codes_do_not_match: PIN codes do not match. Please try again.
play_sound_when_task_status_changes: Play sound when task status changes
please_correct_the_schedule: Please correct the schedule. There must be at least one day when the task will be executed.
please_set_the_following_settings: Optimization mechanisms on some phones unload applications from memory and prevent delivery of notifications.
please_set_the_following_settings2: If you don't receive notifications from the app, please follow these steps. (Unfortunately, these options cannot be set automatically)
premium_requires_hint: This is a premium feature. A premium subscription is required to use it.
premium_via_windows: The premium subscription through the Windows version of Tusk is temporarily unavailable. You can subscribe to a premium subscription through the Android version of Tusk and then log in through the "Settings" - "Sign In" menu.
purchase_error_description: The purchase was not completed. Please try again.
putting_things_in_order_in_business_and_: Putting things in order in business and in the head
quotation100_text: Dreams don't work unless you do.
quotation10_text: We need to accept that we won't always make the right decisions, that we'll screw up royally sometimes – understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success.
quotation12_text: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, love like you'll never be hurt, sing like there's nobody listening, and live like it's heaven on earth.
quotation13_text: Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten.
quotation14_text: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotation15_text: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
quotation16_text: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotation17_text: It's no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
quotation18_text: Smart people learn from everything and everyone, average people from their experiences, stupid people already have all the answers.
quotation19_text: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you'll be criticized anyway.
quotation1_text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotation20_text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotation22_text: The same boiling water that softens the potato hardens the egg. It's what you're made of. Not the circumstances.
quotation23_text: If we have the attitude that it's going to be a great day it usually is.
quotation24_text: You can either experience the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The choice is yours.
quotation26_text: Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.
quotation28_text: If something is important enough, even if the odds are stacked against you, you should still do it.
quotation29_text: Hold the vision, trust the process.
quotation30_text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotation31_text: People who wonder if the glass is half empty or full miss the point. The glass is refillable.
quotation33_text: One day or day one. You decide.
quotation3_text: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
quotation42_text: Every sucessful person in the world is a hustler one way or another. We all hustle to get where we need to be. Only a fool would sit around and wait on another man to feed him.
quotation43_text: Invest in your dreams. Grind now. Shine later.
quotation45_text: Greatness only comes before hustle in the dictionary.
quotation46_text: Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
quotation48_text: Hustle in silence and let your success make the noise.
quotation49_text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotation4_text: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
quotation50_text: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
quotation51_text: I always did something I was a little not ready to do. I think that's how you grow. When there's that moment of ‘Wow, I'm not really sure I can do this,' and you push through those moments, that's when you have a breakthrough.
quotation53_text: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotation54_text: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
quotation55_text: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together
quotation57_text: Very often, a change of self is needed more than a change of scene.
quotation59_text: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
quotation5_text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotation60_text: The hard days are what make you stronger.
quotation61_text: If you believe it'll work out, you'll see opportunities. If you don't believe it'll work out, you'll see obstacles.
quotation62_text: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
quotation64_text: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
quotation65_text: I now tried a new hypothesis: It was possible that I was more in charge of my happiness than I was allowing myself to be.
quotation66_text: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quotation67_text: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotation68_text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotation70_text: Don't say you don't have enough time. You have exactly the same number of hours per day that were given to Helen Keller, Pasteur, Michelangelo, Mother Teresa, Leonardo Da Vinci, Thomas Jefferson, and Albert Einstein.
quotation71_text: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
quotation72_text: If everything seems to be under control, you're not going fast enough.
quotation73_text: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotation75_text: The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
quotation76_text: Unsuccessful people make their decisions based on their current situations. Successful people make their decisions based on where they want to be.
quotation79_text: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
quotation7_text: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
quotation80_text: The miracle is not that we do this work, but that we are happy to do it.
quotation81_text: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotation82_text: If you work on something a little bit every day, you end up with something that is massive.
quotation83_text: The big secret in life is that there is no secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.
quotation84_text: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
quotation86_text: At any given moment you have the power to say: this is not how the story is going to end.
quotation88_text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotation89_text: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotation8_text: I wake up every morning and think to myself, "how far can I push this company in the next 24 hours?"
quotation91_text: Don't limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
quotation92_text: Whenever you find yourself doubting how far you can go, just remember how far you have come.
quotation96_text: When written in Chinese the word "crisis" is composed of two characters – one represents danger and the other represents opportunity.
quotation98_text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotation99_text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotation9_text: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can't hear them anymore.
rearrange_the_schedule_description: Calculate {}-day intervals from the last date of completion.
related_tags_description: Include all tasks with the selected tags.
repeated_tasks_count_description: The number of regular tasks created.
report_bug_description: Please describe the bug you encountered. This will help us solve it as soon as possible. We will inform you about the result by e-mail, left below. Thank you!
reset_password_success: An email was sent to your email with a link to reset your password.
reset_the_task_description: All the completions and skips on the task will be reset, and the start date will be set to today. Proceed?
restore_error_description: The tasks state could not be restored from the archive. Please check the availability of the Internet or try again later.
restore_from_archive_description1: The state of your tasks is archived every day when you first enter the application. The archive limit is 7, the older ones are removed automatically.
restore_from_archive_description2: Select the archive from which the task state should be restored and click the "Restore" button. Please note that the current state of the tasks will be overwritten, and new tasks created after the archive is created will be erased. The restore action is synchronized between devices: if you are using multiple devices, please synchronize before creating new tasks on another device!
restore_from_local_archive_description:
If you accidentally deleted a task and your executions have disappeared, you can restore the status of tasks from the local archive. The archive is created automatically every day when you first log into the application (maximum - 7 archives, old ones are deleted).
Unlike a cloud archive, local archives will be lost if you uninstall or reinstall the application.
reverse_swipe_direction: Reverse swipe direction (right — postpone and skip, left — complete)
saved_as_template: The task has been saved as a template. You can select it when you create a new task.
scheduled_only_description: Display task cards in the list only when they are in the schedule for the current day.
select_calendars_long: Select the calendars from which to import events
select_properties_for_sorting: Select the properties and their order (properties can be dragged and dropped) by which tasks will be sorted.
set_a_password: Set a password with which you log in to your account.
share_text: Look what a cool tracker of tasks and habits! https://play.googlecom/store/apps/details?id=com.soft.tusk
show_a_recurring_task_icon: Show a recurring task icon on the card
show_description_in_task_card: Show description in the task card.
show_pending_status: Show "Pending" status in a task card
show_subtasks_in_task_card: Show subtasks in the task card.
show_tags_on_tasks_screen: Show tags in task cards on the Tasks screen
show_task_info_statistics: Show statistics on the task info screen
show_until_done: Show in the calendar and on the Today screen until the task is finished.
sign_in_later: Try to sign in with another service or try again later.
sign_in_with_email_added: Sign in with e-mail and password added
single_tasks_count_description: The number of one-time tasks created.
skin_tone_description: Select a skin tone for the people on the icons.
start_planning: Start planning, track routine tasks, form healthy habits, and you’ll reach new peaks.
state_restored_description: The state of your tasks has been successfully restored from the archive "{}".
subscription_renews_automatically: Subscription renews automatically. The subscription is managed through the Google Play Store application, the "Subscriptions" menu.
subtasks_limitations: The free version allows to add only 3 subtasks.
sync_as_google_events_description: Google Events have no progress status and only serve as a reminder to complete a task. When a task is completed or skipped, the associated Google Event is removed from Google Calendar. You can specify the exact time for Events.
sync_as_google_tasks_description: Google Tasks have a completion status that syncs with Tusk, allowing you to complete tasks directly from Google Calendar. You cannot set the exact time for a task (Google Tasks API limitation).
sync_at_startup_description: Synchronize tasks with Google Calendar at application launch.
sync_hasnt_been_performed: Synchronization has not been performed yet.
sync_on_change_description: Synchronize tasks with Google Calendar when they are completed or skipped.
tags_list_is_empty: The list of existing tags is empty.
taking_care_of_the_most_important: Taking care of the most important
taking_care_of_yourself_and_your_body: Taking care of yourself and your body
task_color_as_tag_color: Set task color to the color of the first added tag
task_color_is_set_to: The task color is set to the color of the first tag in the list (tags can be sorted). This behavior can be changed in Advanced Settings.
task_creation_button: Task creation button at the bottom of the screen
task_list_will_be_deleted: The task list will be permanently deleted.
tasks_without_due_date_description: Tasks without a due date are displayed on the Tasks page. Use a filter on the page for easy viewing.
tasks_without_runtime: Tasks without runtime are displayed last
templates_hint:
Templates are used to quickly create tasks with predefined settings, such as schedule, number of repetitions, subtasks, etc.
To create a template based on an existing task, open it for editing and click on the "Save as template" at the very bottom of the form.
thank_you_for_purchase_description: Thank you for purchasing! Sign in to enable synchronization and restoring functions.
the_color_wont_be_saved_description: Premium colors require a premium subscription.
the_holidays_only_tied: The holidays only tied to this task directly will be deleted. Holidays for all tasks and holidays associated with tags will remain.
the_icon_wont_be_saved_description: A premium subscription is required to use emoji as an icon.
the_length_of_the_password: The length of the password should be at least 8
the_tag_will_be_deleted: The tag "{}" will be removed from all tasks to which it is attached.
the_task_has_already_been_scheduled: The task has already been scheduled for this day. Two cards will be shown.
there_are_unsaved_changes: There are unsaved changes, save them on exit?
this_is_premium_feature: This is a premium feature. In the free version, it is only available for one active task.
this_operation_is_irreversible: This operation is irreversible, your data will be deleted without a trace!
to_add_login_with_a_password: To add a login with a password you must re-login to your account.
to_change_password: To change the password, you must re-login to your account
to_customize_sorting_properties: To customize the properties, go to "Advanced Settings" -> "Sort Settings".
to_remove_the_task: To remove the task, unbind the tag
today_is_a_holiday_description: Put everything aside and allow yourself to enjoy your vacation.
total_tasks_description: The total number of tasks - one-time and regular, created over time.
try_for_free_description: Free 7-day trial period, after which it switches to an annual subscription for {}. The subscription can be canceled at any time in Google Play in the "Payments and Subscriptions" menu.
try_for_free_description_apple: Free 7-day trial period, after which it switches to an annual subscription for {}.
unknown_error: Unknown error. Please try again later.
updating_please_wait: Updating tasks state. Please, wait a bit...
various_execution_time: Set the execution time in the "Time" section separately for each day of the week.
wanna_get_a_quick_tutorial: Do you want to get a quick tutorial on how to use the app?
windows_on_beta_test: Windows version of Tusk is in beta testing. Errors are possible.
you_can_complete_the_tutorial: You can complete the tutorial at any time by clicking on the "Quick tutorial" item in Settings.
you_can_select_calendars: You can select calendars from which events will be imported into Tusk.
